name: Gamestate De Kuip
description: Located next to the iconic Feyenoord Stadium, Gamestate De Kuip is a vibrant, modern arcade featuring a wide range of games. From thrilling racing simulators and VR shooters to claw machines and basketball hoops. this is the ultimate spot for competitive gamers and casual fun-seekers alike.

name: 160K Retro Video Arcade
description: Step back in time at 160K Retro Video Arcade. This cozy arcade near Rotterdam Centraal is packed with nostalgic classics like Pac-Man, Street Fighter, and pinball machines. It's a must-visit for old-school gamers and anyone craving a vintage gaming vibe.

name: Adventure City Rotterdam
description: Adventure City is more than just a play center. it's a full-blown indoor theme park with climbing walls, laser tag arenas, and interactive games. Perfect for younger players and families looking to explore action-packed adventures in a safe and exciting environment.

name: Lasergame Rotterdam
description: Enter a futuristic battleground with flashing lights, pumping music, and adrenaline-fueled laser tag missions. Lasergame Rotterdam is an immersive experience where strategy and reflexes combine. ideal for groups, parties, or team-building fun.

name: Zero Latency VR
description: Zero Latency offers a mind-blowing, free-roam virtual reality experience. Team up with friends in massive VR arenas where you walk, shoot, dodge, and survive zombie apocalypses or sci-fi battles, no wires, no limits.

name: VR4play
description: VR4play is a dedicated virtual reality center where you can explore various experiences from heart-pounding horror games to relaxing underwater explorations. Whether you're a solo player or coming with friends, VR4play offers something unforgettable.

name: Jump-010
description: Jump-010 combines high-energy fun with interactive tech. Bounce through trampolines, try out parkour tricks, and test your reflexes in augmented challenges. A perfect blend of physical play and digital engagement for all ages.

name: Dutch Pinball Museum
description: Dutch Pinball Museum more than just a museum, this hidden gem lets you actually play on dozens of authentic pinball machines dating from the 1930s to today. The Dutch Pinball Museum is a paradise for tinkerers, collectors, and flipper fans alike.

name: Game Mania Rotterdam
description: Looking to buy the latest console or a rare retro game? Game Mania is Rotterdam’s go-to gaming store, offering everything from PlayStation and Xbox titles to Nintendo Switch accessories and limited edition collectibles.

name: CeX Rotterdam
description: CeX (Complete Entertainment eXchange) is your hub for trading, buying, and selling second-hand games, phones, consoles, and DVDs. Great for budget-conscious gamers or collectors hunting for surprises.

name: The Game Galaxy (Zuidplein)
description: Tucked inside Zuidplein, The Game Galaxy is a colorful store packed with games, Funko Pops, Pokémon cards, and geek culture goodies. Whether you’re a competitive TCG player or casual collector, this place will make you smile.

name: Happy Gamer
description: Happy Gamer is a local favorite for retro consoles, classic video games, and accessories. From NES cartridges to rare handhelds, this shop is a goldmine for nostalgic gamers and curious newbies.

name: Tabletop Rotterdam
description: Board games, card games, D&D nights. Tabletop Rotterdam is the home for analog gamers. With a cozy café vibe and regular events, it’s a welcoming space for nerdy fun and community building.

name: POW! WOW! Gaming Lounge
description: POW! WOW! is a chill lounge where you can kick back with your favorite console titles, old and new. Grab a drink, challenge a friend, or just vibe with retro classics in a laid-back atmosphere.

name: Blast Galaxy Arcade
description: A cozy hidden gem for arcade lovers, Blast Galaxy blends nostalgic machines with modern cabinets and indie rhythm games. It’s compact but packed with variety perfect for short gaming breaks.
